activate_registration_confirmation_text: Do you really want to activate the registration of your event again? By doing so new participants can sign up again.
acknowledge_link_resend_description: If you did not receive the email with the confirmation link, you can resend it here.
acknowledge_link_resend_change_email: You can also change your email address here if it e.g. was not correct.
acknowledge_link_resend_change_email_con: If it still does not work despite resending, please contact us:
acknowledge_link_resend_success: Confirmation link was resent, please check your email inbox (this may take a few minutes).
address_city_zip_invalid: Zip must contain at least 4 digits
agb_link_help: An optional link to AGBs / FAQ
attention_mealtimes_messages_already_sen: If you change the time schedule now, please consider sending messasges to all of your participants so that they know about this change.
checklist_end_of_registrationdate: Wait till end of registration deadline
checklist_send_dinnerroute_messages: Send dinner routes to each team
checklist_send_team_messages: Send messages to each created team
confirmation_activate_subscription_text:
This action should only be performed if a participant has not received his confirmation email, but wants to attend the event.

Internally it will be noted that the confirmation was performed by the event creator and not by the participant himself.
confirmation_activate_subscription_title: Do you really want to manually confirm {{ participantEmail }}?
confirmation_unsaved_data_text: Not yet saved changes. Do you want to continue and lose all your not-saved data or do you want to go back to the form?
deactivate_registration_confirmation_tex: Do you really want to deactivate the registration of your event? By doing so, no new participants can sign up any longer (you can however still add participants manually).
dinner_not_possible: With the current settings and participants it is not possible to create a running dinner event. Most like there exist too few participants.
dinner_route_filter_meal_routes_label: Routes for cooking teams from A to B
dinner_route_filter_from_meal_to_meal_he: Route for teams that prepare {{ to }} and come from {{ from }}.
dinner_route_hosts_near_distance: Hosts with short distance to each other (in meters)
dinner_route_help_near_distance_title: Hosts with short distance to each other
dinner_route_hosts_near_distance_not_fou: No teams found which are less than {{distanceRange}} m apart.
dinner_route_help_intro_2: Understandable. Unfortunately, it's not that easy to give an overview of all the routes of all the teams...
dinner_route_help_filter:
Each team and its route is shown on the map with its own color. Zooming can help if you have a lot of teams.
All teams are displayed by default. You can click on individual teams on the right (Filter) so that only their routes are displayed. This can help you to find your way around better.
dinner_route_help_meals: The meals within a route are indicated by symbols:
dinner_route_help_near_distance: Here you can see at a glance which teams are in close proximity to each other (e.g. in an apartment building, shared flat, ...). This allows you to immediately recognize whether there could be “collisions” at the same time, for example.
dinner_route_help_from_meal_to_meal_2: One team cooks {{ to }} and therefore visits another team beforehand for {{ from }}.
dinner_route_help_from_meal_to_meal_3: Ideally, the distance from {{ from }} to {{ to }} should not be too far.
dinner_route_help_from_meal_to_meal_4: By selecting this filter option (in the settings), you will only see the relevant routes.
dinner_route_help_distances_1: Here you can see at a glance the (longest) distances between the individual stations of a team.
dinner_route_help_distances_2: The team with the longest individual distance between 2 courses is displayed at the top (and sorted downwards).
dinner_route_help_distances_3: The longest distance in each route is highlighted in <LongestDistance>color</LongestDistance>.
dinner_route_help_distances_4: The display within a route is from left to right:
dinner_route_help_distances_5: The team to which the route applies is highlighted. Example:
dinner_route_help_misc:
All distances are calculated as the crow flies using an approximation method. The actual distances may therefore differ.
The overall route overview is not very mobile-friendly, so it is recommended to use at least a tablet.
dinner_route_optimize_error: Unfortunately, there was a problem optimizing your dinner routes. Please contact support or try again later.
dinner_route_optimize_description:
Here you can recalculate the dinner routes to optimize the walking distances.

The system will try to optimize the routes so that the teams have the shortest possible walking distances. The result will then be shown to you in a new browser tab as a preview.
dinner_route_optimize_note: Your dinner routes will only be changed once you save the suggested changes in the preview.
dinner_route_optimize_ignore_meal_assign: Allows the optimization to discard existing meal assignments of teams in order to achieve more optimized routes
dinner_route_optimize_minimum_distance: Minimum distance between hosts at the same time
dinner_route_optimize_minimum_distance_h: Can help prevent hosts in close proximity from being visited at the same time.
dinner_route_optimize_preview_diff_gener: You can compare the newly calculated routes with those in your old browser tab. Do you like the result? Then you can save the new routes now.
dinner_route_optimize_preview_diff_negat: The newly calculated routes are not shorter than the old ones. You can still save the newly calculated routes.
dinner_route_optimize_preview_diff_posit: With the newly calculated routes, a total of {{ distance }} distance is saved.
The average saving per team route is {{ distance }}.
Do you like the result? Then you can save the new routes now.
dinner_route_optimize_preview_refresh: If you want to see this view again, refresh this browser tab (or press F5).
dinner_route_optimize_preview_save_error: Unfortunately, the optimization of your dinner routes could not be saved. Please return to the original route overview and perform a new optimization.
dinner_route_optimize_prediction_no_impa: Due to too many missing or incorrect geodata, no meaningful optimization of the routes can be performed.
dinner_route_optimize_prediction_impact: The impact of the optimization will likely be {{ impact }}.
dinner_route_optimization_running: Routes are being optimized, this may take 1-2 minutes. Please do not close this window!
dinner_route_optimization_rate_limit: There are currently too many route optimization requests. You can try again in about 3 minutes.
dinner_route_optimization_save_success_1: Optimized dinner routes have been saved successfully.
dinner_route_optimization_save_success_2: You can close your old browser tab. You will now find the new, optimized route overview here.
event_cancel_send_messages_hint: You should notify all registered participants about the cancellation, hence you will directly be redirected to the participant messaging after cancellation.
event_cancel_text_1: You are going to finally cancel your event.
event_cancel_text_2: This action cannot be undone, so please think carefully about this issue before finally cancelling your event!
event_cancel_text_3: All data of this event will automatically be deleted within 1-2 days and cannot be recovered. For so long you can still view the data.
event_cancel_text_no_registration_hint: No participant can registrate himself after cancelling the event.
hostlocations_overview_help:
Here you will find an overview of all routes with further information, as well as options such as route optimization.
If you want to view the route for a single team, you can alternatively select a team from the list here and open its route.
hostlocations_team_filter: Select single team(s) for filtering the dinner routes
hostlocations_team_cluster_view_help: Mark teams within the same geo-cluster with the same color
hostlocations_team_connections_view_help: Show routes between host locations as lines (connections) between them
invalid_size_selected_participants_messa: You need at least one recipient for sending messages. There is no single recipient with the current selection.
mails_send_dinnerroutes_title: Send Dinner Routes - Running Dinner Administration
mails_send_participants_title: Send mails to Participants - Running Dinner Administration
mails_send_teams_title: Send mails to Teams - Running Dinner Administration
mails_send_to_dinner_owner: Successfully sent test EMail(s). Please check your mailbox.
mails_senddinnerroute_hosts: Template for the meal description of the teams that will be visited on the dinner route
mails_senddinnerroute_self: Template for the meal decription of the team that will cook this meal.
mails_template_help_description: During sending these placeholders will be replaced by the data of each individual participant. You can take the preview, if you are curious about what the final result will look like.
mails_template_replacement_host: This text will replace the {host} template for the participant which will be the host.
mails_template_replacement_nonhost: This text will replace the {host} template for the participant which is NOT the host.
mails_template_replacement_route_guest: This text will replace the {route} template for the guest teams
mails_template_replacement_route_host: This text will replace the {route} template for the hosting team.
mails_template_sendteams_host: You are suggested to be the host. If this is not okay for you then please talk to your team partner and re-arrange this setting if needed.
mails_template_sendteams_message:
Hello {firstname} {lastname},

Your team-partner will be:

{partner}.

You have been assigned the following meal: {meal}.
The time for your meal will be {mealtime}.

{host}

You can manage the host arrangement by yourself (until final dinner routes are set up) if you wish another host arrangement. Please use the following link for doing so:
{managehostlink}
Please talk to each other however before doing so!
mails_template_sendteams_nonhost: {partner} is suggested to be the host.
messages_landing_start_1: The message center offers tailor-made communication for all Running Dinner participants.
messages_landing_start_2: Here you can send all kinds of messages via email to your participants or teams.
messages_landing_participants_descriptio: Keep everyone involved up to date and ensure smooth coordination. You can also send (advance) information to all or individual participants here.
messages_landing_teams_description: Each arranged team receives detailed information about who is cooking with whom, which dishes are being prepared and who is acting as host. You can also send other messages to all or individual teams.
messages_landing_dinnerroutes_descriptio: This is where teams receive their specific dinner routes, including host details and schedules. Typically, these messages are sent out shortly before the event. You can also send changes to the dinner routes to (individual) teams.
messages_landing_team_arrangements_neede: (Only available after team arrangements have been generated)
messages_preview_empty: To see the preview, the subject and message must be filled in.
message_tasks_no_selection: Please select a message for viewing it's details!
message_template_help_description: The placeholders used are dynamically replaced by the system with the corresponding values. This allows you to send personalized messages to your participants or teams, saving you the tedious effort of writing to each participant or team individually:
message_template_help_firstname: First name of the message participant
message_template_help_lastname: Last name of the message participant
message_template_help_mealtime: Time when the meal is taken
message_template_help_mealspecifics: Special dietary requests of all guests or team partners
message_template_help_host: Host information for the team (where the meal will be cooked)
message_template_help_managehostlink: Link to host management (the team can change the host assignment themselves)
message_template_help_route: Complete route of the team including host information (see blocks below)
message_template_help_routelink: Link to the live view of the dinner route
meals_add_constraint: You can only add a maxium of 3 meals.
meals_swap_team_description: {{team}} is currently cooking the following meal: {{meal}}
meals_swap_team_after_swap_src: Team with {{team}} will be the new team {{newTeamNumber}} with following meal assigned: {{meal}}.
meals_swap_team_after_swap_selected: Team with {{team}} will be the new team {{newTeamNumber}} with following meal assigned: {{meal}}.
meals_update_cause_drop_teams: By removing and/or adding meals, all existing team arrangements will be dropped. You can generate new team arrangements afterwards.
notification_dinner_acknowledge_required: Currently you can't send any messages, due to you have not yet confirmed your dinner event (check your emails for a confirmation link).
notification_dinner_cancellation_text: You have finally cancelled this dinner event at {{ cancellationDate }}. Please notify all participants if not yet done. All data will automatically be deleted in the next days.
notification_dinner_demo_mode: This is the demo mode. You can test all features. All messages will however be send to you (instead of the 'real' recipients).
notification_dinner_expired: Your event has expired. For data protection reasons, your Running Dinner event will be automatically deleted in the next few days. If you still need data, please download it.
open_dinner_link_help: You can share this link with your friends and acquaintances. Each person who knows this link can self-register to your event.
participant_deletion_confirmation_headli: Do you really want to delete {{ fullname }}?
participant_deletion_confirmation_team_h: Due to this participant is already assigned into a team, this participant will firstly cancelled.
participant_deletion_confirmation_text: All data from {{ fullname }} will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
participant_empty_selection: Please select a participant for viewing and/or editing his details!
participant_search_placeholder: Search for name, email, or address
participant_selection_assigned_to_teams: Only participants mixed up into teams
participant_selection_assigned_to_teams_: {{ numberOfSelectedParticipants }} participants mixed up into teams selected
participant_selection_not_assigned_to_te: {{ numberOfSelectedParticipants }} participants on waiting list selected
participant_teampartnerwish_new_particip: Please fill in all needed data and save this new participant!
participant_teampartnerwish_sent_invitat: Invitation to {{ email }} was successfully sent.
participant_teampartnerwish_update_parti: {{ fullnameThis }} was added as well as team-partner-wish in {{ fullnameOther }}
participants_all_assignable_text: Congratulations, all of your participants can be mixed up into teams.
participants_count_closed_event: Currently you have {{ numParticipants }} participants in your event.
participants_waitinglist_info_text: Currently not all participants can be arranged into teams. You can find more information about this in the list below.
participants_count_public_event: Currently there are {{ numParticipants }} participants registrated.
participants_count_sufficient: With these participants you would be ableto create {{ numExpectedTeams }} Teams. There are {{ numNotAssignableParticipants }} participants which cannot be mixed up into teams.
participants_count_too_few: Currently you have not enough participants for generating teams.
participants_no_existing_text: No participants so far. You can also manually add participants if you know that they will take part on your event.
participants_remaining_not_assignable_te: The following participants cannot currently be arranged into teams and are therefore on the waitinglist.
The following participants are currently on the waitinglist.
participant_swap_number_child_only_possi: Participants who have been automatically registered by another participant can only be exchanged with individual participants, but not with participants with a fixed team partner wish.
participant_swap_number_violates_team_pa: Participants who have been automatically registered by someone else cannot be moved down the list.
participants_swap_number_choose_text: Select a participant with whom you would like to swap places with {{ fullname }}.
participants_swap_number_note_waitinglis: Note: This function is particularly useful for adding or removing participants from the waiting list.
participants_swap_number_teams_existing_: Participants already arranged into teams cannot be swapped. To do this, you must first drop team arrangements and generate them again later (-> <anchor>Drop team arrangements</anchor>).
Participants already arranged into teams cannot be swapped. To do this, you must first drop team arrangements and generate them again later.
participants_too_few_text: Unfortunately you have too few participants for a Running Dinner event. You need at least a total of {{ minSizeNeeded }} participants, hence you need still at least {{ missingParticipants }} more participants.
participant_manual_activation_success: Manual activation of subscription for {{ participantEmail }} succeeded
payment_options_help: Currently registrations for this event are free. Participants must pay a registration fee, if you add payment options.
payment_options_edit_help: Please enter the name of the organizer that shall be displayed upong PayPal payment. And enter the price per single registration (teampartner registrations have the doubled price).
redirect_after_purchase_link: Link to be redirected after purchase
redirect_after_purchase_link_help: An optioanl link to be redirected after a participant has been successfully paid and registered
registrations_not_yet_confirmed_old_info: The following registrations have been pending for some time, but have not yet been confirmed.

Unfortunately it can happen that the mails with the confirmation links do not arrive (especially T-Online likes to block... but it can also be that an email address was entered incorrectly or a participant has simply not yet responded).
It is recommended to make a contact, as unconfirmed registrations will not be considered for team arrangement.
You can confirm these registrations manually at any time.
registrations_not_yet_confirmed_teams_no: There are not yet confirmed registrations. If you generate the team arrangements now, they will not be taken into account!
You can also see the list shown here in the <anchor>Dashboard</anchor> and you can confirm these registrations there manually (but it is advisable to make a contact first if you are in doubt).
runningdinner_acknowledge_congratulation: Congratulations, you have successfully confirmed your created running dinner event. Now you can use all features (also sending messages)!
runningdinner_acknowledge_error_text:
Unfortunately there occurred an error while trying to confirm your running dinner event. Please try it again later.
If this error still occurrs, then write a message to .
send_again_help_text: You can edit the message (or even change the recipient email address) before trying to send the message again.
settings_update_date_change:
You are about to change the date of your event and already have participants in your event.
Please remember to inform your participants about this change in cases they don't know so far (e.g. via mail).
You can do this - if desired - directly after saving your settings.
settings_update_closed_to_public_change: You are about to publish your event, so after saving your changes you should still adjust the public settings.
settings_update_closed_to_open_change:
You are about to open your event so that participants can register themselves (via secret link), so after saving your changes you can still adjust the public settings.
In addition, you can share the generated secret login link (see dashboard) with your friends / acquaintances.
settings_update_nonclosed_to_closed_chan: After you save your changes, no participant will be able to register themselves, you will have to add all participants manually.
synchronize_messagejobs_help: It is not guaranteed that every message will successfully be transferred to each recipient, event if the sending is marked as successful: Emails can e.g. be marked as spam or a mailbox may be full, ... RunYourDinner will try to detect such issues and show them to you, but this may take some time (hours till days).
team_cancel_complete_message: The meal {{ meal }} of team {{ teamNumber }} will completely be cancelled, due to you don't have selected enough replacing participants. You can fill up this team later, if there are enough participants on the waitinglist.
team_cancel_hint_dinnerroutes_sent: You should notify all affected teams about the cancellation in the next step, due to you have arlready sent dinner routes.
team_cancel_hint_notify_teams: The affected teams don't know yet that they will be hosts and/or guests of {{ teamName }}. You can however notify the affected teams in the next step, about the issue that they have to skip one meal on their dinner route.
team_cancel_info_headline_sufficient_par: Sufficient number of participants on waiting list!
team_cancel_info_headline_too_few_partic: Currently there are not enough participants on waiting list for replacing complete team!
team_cancel_info_text: If a team must be completly cancelled (due to all members are cancelled) you can replace this team by participants from the waiting list. This works however only if there are enough participants on the waiting list, otherwise the meal of this team will completly be cancelled.
team_cancel_info_text_sufficient_partici: Select {{ teamSize }} new participants for replacing {{ teamName }}.
team_cancel_info_text_too_few_participan:
You need {{ numNeededParticipants }} more participants.
You can just cancel the complete team when proceeding to the next step. If more participants sign up later, you can fill up the team with them again.
team_cancel_member_success_text: {{ fullname }} was removed from team and deleted
team_cancel_remove_text: The following team members will be removed from {{ teamName }}...
team_cancel_replace_team_members_success: {{ cancelledOrReplacedTeam }} was successfully replaced by new participants.
team_cancel_replaced_by_text: ... and will be replaced by the following participants:
team_member_cancel_host_info: Due to this team member was the host, another team member will automatically become the new host.
team_member_cancel_info:
Team member {{ teamMemberToCancel }} will be removed, the team will however still exist. This means that {{ remainingTeamMemberNames }} will cook alone. You can also cancel the complete team, if {{ remainingTeamMemberNames }} will not participate any longer.
You can later replace this team member by participants that are on the waiting list (if any).
team_member_cancel_whole_team: {{ teamMemberToCancel }} is the last team member of this team. Therefore the complete team must be cancelled which can be performed in the next step.
team_partner_wish_existing_text:
You have entered {{ matchingParticipant }} as team partner wish. {{ matchingParticipant }} already exists in your event.
Do you want to enter {{ participant }} as well als team partner wish in {{ matchingParticipant }}?
team_partner_wish_help: Has this participant a fixed team partner wish? By entering the EMail address of this wished team partner, it is ensured that both will be mixed up into one team.
team_partner_wish_not_existing_create_cl: Do you want to directly create this partner wish?
team_partner_wish_not_existing_create_pu: Or alternatively: Do you want to directly create this partner wish?
team_partner_wish_not_existing_send_emai: Do you want to send an invitation mail to this partner wish?
team_partner_wish_not_existing_text: You have entered {{ teamPartnerWish }} as team partner wish, which however does not exist in your event so far.
team_swap_success_text: {{ fullnameSrc }} was successfully swapped with {{ fullnameDest }}!
teampartner_placeholder: EMail address of team partner wish
teams_drag_drop_hint: You can swap team-members of different teams by using Drag & Drop.
teams_drop_confirmation: Do you really want to drop the team arrangements? All previous teams will be discarded, you can then re-create the teams yourself.
teams_generate_deadline_open_info: The registration deadline is still open till {{ endOfRegistrationDate }}.
teams_generate_deadline_open_warning: The registration deadline is still open till {{ endOfRegistrationDate }}. Do you really want to generate team arrangements?
teams_no_selection: Please select a team for viewing and/or editing it's details!
teams_reset_confirmation: Do you really want to re-generate the team arrangements? All existing teams will be discarded and new (random) team arrangements will be created.
teams_reset_hint_dinnerroute_messages_se: You have already sent messaages about the dinner routes. When re-generating the team arrangements, the already sent dinner routes (and also team arrangements) will be not valid any longer. You should notify all teams in detail about this issue, before performing this action!
teams_reset_hint_team_messages_sent:
You probably have already sent messages about the team arrangements, please think about to notify your teams (if not already happened) that the already sent team arrangements are not valid any longer.
Finally you should send again messages to the new generated teams.
teams_reset_hint_team_partner_wish: Note: Participants with fixed team partner wishes will of course be mixed again with their wish partners as a team.
teams_reset_success_text: Old team arrangements were removed and new team arrangements have been generated
team_swap_violates_team_partner_wish: The swap of those team members would violate at least one team partner wish and is hence blocked. If you really want to perform this action, then you have to remove the respective team partner wishes of the affected participants.
team_partner_wish_registration_delete_ch: {{ fullname }} was registered as a fixed team partner by {{ root_fullname }}. Deleting automatically cancels this team partner request.
team_partner_wish_registration_delete_ro: {{ fullname }} registered {{ child_fullname }} as a fixed team partner request, thus {{ child_fullname }} will also automatically be deleted.
team_partner_wish_registration_change_te: The host cannot be changed for this team, as it is a permanently registered fixed team, with only one given address.
team_partner_wish_registration_child_par: <anchor>{{ fullname }}</anchor> was registered as fixed team partner.
All address- and contact-data can therefore be found with {{ fullname }}.
Registered by {{ fullname }} as fixed team partner.
The address- and contact-data can be found with <anchor>{{ fullname }}</anchor>, due to the registration was performeed by this participant.
team_partner_wish_registration_fulfilled: Team partner wish fulfilled by registration
team_partner_wish_invitation_not_found: No participant can be assigned with the given team partner wish Email.
team_partner_wish_invitation_found: Participant with given team partner wish email registered.
waitinglist_assign_participants_teams: Fill up teams with participants from the waitinglist
waitinglist_assign_participants_teams_su: Teams filled up by selected participants!
waitinglist_assign_participants_teams_se: (Select the participants you want to add to this team)
There can only be max. {{ teamSize }} participant(s) in a team!
waitinglist_num_participants_assignment_: Use this to fill up the following teams that are no longer complete due to cancellations.
waitinglist_num_participants_list_info: You currently have {{ numParticipants }} participants on the waitinglist.
waitinglist_num_missing_teammembers: For this you can use a total of {{ totalNumberOfMissingTeamMembers }} participants.
waitinglist_generate_teams_select_hint: (Select the participants to be arranged as new teams)
waitinglist_generate_teams_selected_too_: You can select a maximum of {{ numParticipants }} participants. Please deselect other participants first.
waitinglist_generate_teams_num_participa: There are {{ numParticipants }} participants which can be arranged as new teams
There are still {{ numRemainingParticipants }} participants which remain.
If there are {{ numMissingParticipantsForFullTeamArrangement }} more participants, you can add all of them later as additional teams as well.
waitinglist_teams_not_generated: Depending on the number of participants, it may not be possible to arrange all registered participants into teams. Here you can manage all remaining participants after you have generated the teams.
waitinglist_teams_not_generated_options: The following options are available to you then:
waitinglist_teams_not_generated_option_1: Replace cancelled participants / cancelled teams with participants on waitinglist
waitinglist_teams_not_generated_option_2: With sufficient number on waitinglist, add participants as teams afterwards
waitinglist_teams_not_generated_option_3: Distribute remaining participants to existing teams (not yet available, but coming soon... until then you have to do this manually with paper + pen)
waitinglist_teams_not_generated_hint: It generally makes sense to always do the team generation as late as possible and as early as necessary.
waitinglist_no_simple_action_distributio: Currently there is no possibility to automatically distribute leftover participants to existing teams. This feature is currently being worked on, but it is not yet available. Until then, and if you want to do this, you will have to do it manually with pen and paper, but afterwards you can conveniently notify the affected teams via team messaging.
waitinglist_no_simple_action_missing_par:
The {{ numRemainingParticipants }} remaining participants on the waitinglist cannot be added as new teams.
For this, {{ numMissingParticipantsForFullTeamArrangement }} additional participants are currently still missing.
waitinglist_no_simple_action_distributio: The following options are available to you:
First come first serve: The remaining participants do not take part in the event at first, but can replace possible participant cancellations / team cancellations later on, if necessary.
If {{ numMissingParticipantsForFullTeamArrangement }} additional participants register, you can add them as new teams.
waitinglist_notification_dinnerroutes_se:
You have also already sent out the dinner routes. Due to your changes, there may be multiple changes to the routes of individual teams.
It is therefore recommended that you additionally resend all dinner routes later.
waitinglist_notification_teams_info: Now that the following teams have changed in composition, you should notify them of the changes:
invalid_size_waitinglist_participants_to: Please select the participants you would like to fill the teams with
You have selected too few participants
invalid_team_member_cancellation_root_te: You cannot remove {{ fullname }}, because {{ fullname }} has registered this team as a fixed cooking team. Instead, you must remove or cancel the entire team.
invalid_replacement_participants_inconsi: The selected participants cannot be used, as this will prevent at least one team partner request from being fulfilled.
invalid_waitinglist_teamgeneration_incon: The selected participants cannot be used, as this will prevent at least one team partner request from being fulfilled. Please change your selection.
